MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML6 postcode areas of Airdrie. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.39pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a fault on our electrical network near Cromlet Farm and Braeside Coatbridge affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:05am on 6th March
